LanguageData.Brain.label: brain cells
LanguageData.Brain.description: A biological brain cells. The main core of almost all organic life. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Stomach.label: stomach
LanguageData.Stomach.description: A biological stomach. Digests food and turns it into energy. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Leg.label: leg
LanguageData.Leg.description: A biological leg. Lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Foot.label: foot
LanguageData.Foot.description: A biological foot. Part of leg that lets you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Toe.label: toe
LanguageData.Toe.description: A biological toe. Part of foot that helps you move around. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Shoulder.label: shoulder
LanguageData.Shoulder.description: A biological shoulder. Lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Arm.label: arm
LanguageData.Arm.description: A biological arm. Lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Hand.label: hand
LanguageData.Hand.description: A biological hand. Part of arm that lets you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Finger.label: finger
LanguageData.Finger.description: A biological finger. Part of hand that helps you work and carry stuff. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Eye.label: eye
LanguageData.Eye.description: A biological eye. Absorbs light, which lets a person to see. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Ear.label: ear
LanguageData.Ear.description: A biological ear. Picks up vibrations, allowing people to hear sound. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Nose.label: nose
LanguageData.Nose.description: A biological nose. The finishing touch to a face. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
LanguageData.Jaw.label: jaw
LanguageData.Jaw.description: A biological jaw. Allow people to eat and socializing. Requires organ transplantation research to transplant it.
